inputs.name: table
inputs.value:

Start Date End Date From To

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello there!
This is an automated email for the time off request of @{outputs('Get_user_profile_(V2)')?['body/displayName']}.

Here are the days they are requesting off:
@{variables('table')}
